Class TablrManager

java.lang.Object
main.TablrManager
public class TablrManager extends Object
TablrManager is responsible for managing a collection of tables and their corresponding operations. It provides methods to manipulate tables, columns, and rows, as well as notifying listeners about changes.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    TablrManager()
    Constructs a new instance of the TablrManager class.

  • Constructor Details

    • TablrManager

      public TablrManager()
      Constructs a new instance of the TablrManager class. This constructor initializes the TablrManager with an empty list of tables and listeners. It also notifies registered listeners of a change in the state by invoking the `fireContentsChanged` method.

  • Method Details

    • addListener

      public void addListener(TablrManagerListener listener)
      Registers a new listener to the TablrManager. The listener will be notified of content changes in the TablrManager.
      Parameters:
      listener - The listener to be added. Must implement the TablrManagerListener interface.

    • removeListener

      public void removeListener(TablrManagerListener listener)
      Removes a listener from the TablrManager. The listener will no longer be notified of content changes in the TablrManager.
      Parameters:
      listener - The listener to be removed. Must implement the TablrManagerListener interface.

    • addTable

      public void addTable()
      Adds a table, generates a unique name.

    • removeTable

      public void removeTable(String table)
      Removes a table with the specified name from the list of tables managed by the TablrManager. If a table with the specified name exists, it is removed, and all registered listeners are notified of the content change.
      Parameters:
      table - The name of the table to be removed.

    • getTableNames

      public List<String> getTableNames()
      Retrieves a list of table names managed by the TablrManager.
      Returns:
      a list of strings representing the names of all tables.

    • getColumnsInfo

      public List<String> getColumnsInfo(String tableName)
      Parameters:
      tableName - The name of the table.
      Returns:
      A list with the info of the columns.

    • changeName

      public void changeName(String table, String newName)
      Parameters:
      table - The old name of the table.
      newName - The new name of the table.

    • changeNameColumn

      public void changeNameColumn(String table, String column, String newName)
      Parameters:
      table - The name of the table.
      newName - The new name of the table.

    • addColumn

      public void addColumn(String table)
      Parameters:
      table - The name of the table.

    • getColumnNames

      public List<String> getColumnNames(String table)
      Parameters:
      table - The name of the table.
      Returns:
      A list of all the names of the columns.

    • removeColumn

      public void removeColumn(String table, String c)
      Parameters:
      table - The name of the table wherein the column is.
      c - The name of the column to remove.

    • getColumns

      public List<List<String>> getColumns(String table)
      Retrieves all columns of the specified table.
      Parameters:
      table - The name of the table from which the columns are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of lists where each inner list contains the values of a single column.

    • addRow

      public void addRow(String table)
      Adds a new row to the specified table, identified by its name. Once the row is added, all registered listeners are notified of the change.
      Parameters:
      table - The name of the table where a new row will be added.

    • removeRow

      public void removeRow(String table, int row)
      Removes a row from the specified table and notifies listeners of the change.
      Parameters:
      table - The name of the table from which to remove the row.
      row - The index of the row to be removed.

    • updateCell

      public void updateCell(String nameTable, String nameColumn, Integer rowIndex, String value)
      Updates the value of a cell in a specified table and column at the given row index. After updating the cell, this method notifies all registered listeners about the change.
      Parameters:
      nameTable - The name of the table containing the cell to update.
      nameColumn - The name of the column containing the cell to update.
      rowIndex - The index of the row containing the cell to update.
      value - The new value to set in the specified cell.

    • getCell

      public String getCell(String nameTable, String nameColumn, Integer rowIndex)
      Retrieves the value of a specific cell in a table.
      Parameters:
      nameTable - The name of the table containing the desired cell.
      nameColumn - The name of the column containing the desired cell.
      rowIndex - The index of the row containing the desired cell.
      Returns:
      The value of the cell as a String.

    • changeAllowBlanks

      public void changeAllowBlanks(String tableName, String columnName)
      Toggles the ability to allow blank values in a specific column of a specified table. This method updates the blank allowance setting for the given column and notifies all registered listeners about the change.
      Parameters:
      tableName - The name of the table containing the column to update.
      columnName - The name of the column whose blank allowance setting will be changed.

    • changeType

      public void changeType(String table, String column)
      Changes the type of the specified column in the specified table. This method locates the table by its name, updates the type of the given column, and notifies all registered listeners of the change.
      Parameters:
      table - The name of the table containing the column whose type is to be changed.
      column - The name of the column whose type will be modified.

    • getDefaultValue

      public Object getDefaultValue(String table, String column)
      Retrieves the default value of a specific column in a specified table.
      Parameters:
      table - The name of the table containing the column.
      column - The name of the column for which the default value is to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      The default value of the specified column in the table, or null if no default value is set.

    • getClass

      public Class<?> getClass(String table, String column)
      Retrieves the class type of the specified column in the specified table.
      Parameters:
      table - The name of the table containing the column.
      column - The name of the column whose class type is to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      The Class object representing the type of the specified column in the table.

    • setDefaultValue

      public void setDefaultValue(String table, String column, String value)
      Sets the default value for a specified column in a specified table. This method locates the table by its name, updates the default value of the given column, and notifies all registered listeners of the change.
      Parameters:
      table - The name of the table containing the column.
      column - The name of the column for which the default value is to be set.
      value - The default value to assign to the specified column.
